document_data.name: Umbra
document_data.mainbody: '''Umbra''' was the leader of the [[Dragonbloods]], a [[Luskan]] gang. He was rumored to be a [[dragon]]{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|742}} but he was actually some sort of [[doppelganger]].{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3427}} Umbra's face constantly shifted and his true form was unknown.
document_data.History: In [[1480 DR]], while investigating the [[Fury]] plague sweeping Luskan, [[Myrin Darkdance]] and [[Kalen Dren]] visited Umbra at the Dragonblood's compound. Umbra had been Myrin's lover many decades ago and when he kissed Myrin she absorbed his memories of her.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3981}} Unfortunately, while absorbing Umbra's memories, she inadvertently drained his life force, leaving him a pile of dust.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3613}}
